Texts.Chs: 物质萃取器是你最重要的基础研究设备。有了它，你就可以从物质中获得各种无法直接获取的资源。
Texts.Eng: The Extraction Lab is perhaps your most important basic lab station. With it you can gather hidden resources from most types of soils, produce, meats and so on.

Texts.Chs: 使用电弧熔炼炉，你可以通过熔炼高质量金属，解锁你闻所未闻的各类护甲！
Texts.Eng: With a Fission Furnace you can produce the highest quality metals known, allowing you access to a vastly expanded tree of equipment.
